title: Fracture
description: Deals [70% Attack Power] weapon damage. Lowers target's Physical Resistance by 20% for 1 turn.

title: Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt and Max Life by 15%. Increases Damage Received by 15%.

title: Double Edge
description: Deals [180% Attack Power] weapon damage to the target and 15% of the damage back to you.

title: Elemental Fracture
description: Deals [70% Attack Power] weapon damage and lowers target's Elemental Resistance by 25% for 1 turn.

title: Threatening Fracture
description: Deals [70% Attack Power] weapon damage while stealing 10% of the target's Physical Resistance for 1 turn.

title: Tempered Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt and Max Life by 15%.

title: Beserker's Rage
description: Increases Damage Dealt by 25%. Increases Max Life and Damage Received by 15%.

title: Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [150% Attack Power] weapon damage.

title: Bloodlet
description: Sacrifice 15% of your maximum health in exchange for an additional action this turn.

title: Slam
description: Deals [160% Attack Power] physical damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

title: Warrior's Boon
description: Heals 30% of maximum health and removes all negative statuses.

title: Howl
description: Deals [80% Attack Power] physical damage. Enemies within 2 hexes deal 20% less damage for 2 turns.

title: Bleeding Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [80% Attack Power] as weapon damage. Applies 3 stacks of Bleeding on all targets hit.

title: Life Cleave
description: Swing in a 180 degree arc striking all foes for [150% Attack Power] weapon damage. Heals you for 20% of the damage dealt.

title: Stunning Slam
description: Deals [180% Attack Power] physical damage and applies Stunned to all enemies within 2 hexes for 1 turn. Replaces Slam.

title: Crushing Slam
description: Deals [240% Attack Power] physical damage and applies Stunned to all enemies within 2 hexes for 1 turn. Replaces Slam.

title: Vitality Break
description: Consumes 50% of your current health and deals 200% of that in physical damage to the target. This is uneffected by damage boosts, and will only scale off of HP consumed.

title: Unyielding Contender
description: Become immune to one enemy's damage for 1 turn.

title: Sunder
description: Deals [200% Attack Power] weapon damage. Ignores all armor and resists. Heal for 50% of damage caused.

title: Wanderer
description: Increases Movement Points by 1.

title: Warmonger I
description: Increases the effectiveness of damaging and healing skills by 8%.

title: Guardian I
description: Increases Physical Resistance by 5%.

title: Challenger
description: For every enemy within 1 hex of your character gain 2% to All Resistances.

title: Opportunist
description: Perform an opportunity attack against enemies that move out of melee range.

title: Warmonger II
description: Increases the effectiveness of damaging and healing skills by an additional 12% for a total of 20%.

title: Guardian II
description: Increases Physical Resistance by an additional 10% for a total of 15%.

title: Into the Fray
description: For every enemy within 3 hexes of your character gain 3% Increased Damage and 3% Maximum Health.

title: Furious George
description: Might increases the effectiveness of Armor and Magic Armor by 0.5% per point.

title: Shield Mastery
description: Increases Armor and Magic Armor from shields by 100%.

title: Two-Handed Mastery
description: While a two handed weapon is equipped, all damage is increased by 20%.

title: Dual Wield Mastery
description: While dual wielding Dodge Chance is increased by 10%, Critical Hit Chance is increased by 8% and Critical Hit Damage is increased by 25%.

title: Beserker's Blood
description: For every 1% of health missing, gain 0.5% increased damage.

title: Bone Collector
description: Every enemy that dies grants 6% Maximum Health and 6% Increased Damage. Lasts the duration of the battle. Stacks up to 5 times.

title: Blood Drinker
description: Increases the basic attack damage by 50%. Heal for 20% of damage caused by basic attacks.

title: Executioner
description: Every enemy that dies grants 1 additional AP. Can only grant up to 1 additional AP per turn.

title: Colossus
description: Damage you deal splashes to enemies within 1 hex for 50% of the damage dealt.

title: Indestructible
description: Gain a 35% resistance to the last type of damage taken.
